projects.title: 4DV
projects.blurb: Media framework with an additional *.4dv metadata layer. Provides a fourth dimension to video and audio by embedding MetaTagDB-driven tags, annotations, and contextual overlays for deep content indexing, extraction, and analysis.

projects.title: BitBroker
projects.blurb: Programmable Bitcoin order-router & market microstructure research toolkit.

projects.title: BitRNG
projects.blurb: Bitcoin-driven randomness services for cryptographic sampling and lotteries.

projects.title: Cryptainer
projects.blurb: Sealed-compute containers with GPG identity, policy manifests, and auditable I/O.

projects.title: MetaTagDB
projects.blurb: Distributed metadata hash DB for forensics and authenticated leak catalogs.

projects.title: Speciedex
projects.blurb: Species taxonomy engine (bio & myth) with AI-augmented classification.

projects.title: SpeciedexCore
projects.blurb: Inference kernel for species ID, evolution mapping, and tokenized outputs.

projects.title: SpeciedexNet
projects.blurb: Federated P2P knowledge network with signed, versioned contributions.

projects.title: ISVN (Internet Streaming Video Network)
projects.blurb: 24/7 video broadcast platform: TV-style channels with continuous M3U playlists.

projects.title: ISAN (Internet Streaming Audio Network)
projects.blurb: Radio-style 24/7 audio broadcast platform: streaming playlists with M3U feeds.

projects.title: CyberChefKit
projects.blurb: CyberChef + GPG integrations for cryptography/threat analysis workflows.
